script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Next up, we have Andrea, a Google Data Engineer from London, originally from Italy! He's passionate about music and coding, and today he's bringing us a unique fusion of both worlds. Andrea will be performing an acoustic version of 'Somebody to Love' by Queen, but with a data-driven twist! He's even dedicating this performance to one of our judges. Andrea, take it away!

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: START PERFORMANCE - Andrea performs his data-themed rendition of 'Somebody to Love', with the lyrics altered to be about finding data to flow.

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Well, that was... different. I appreciate the dedication to Queen, but 'find some data to flow'? Not exactly stadium rock, is it?

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Hey, I kinda dug it! It's catchy, man. Plus, any song that combines Queen and data engineering gets a thumbs up from me. Freddie would've approved... maybe.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, I felt your passion, and that's what matters most.  The vulnerability in your voice, the way you connected with the lyrics, even the data parts, it was truly your own.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, that dedication was... unexpected, to say the least.  I admire your bravery, both in love and in song!  And hey, data flow is important, right?

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: A data-driven 'Somebody to Love', who could have predicted that? So, judges, did Andrea's performance find the right data flow to move on to the next round?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: I gotta be honest, it wasn't my cup of tea. It's a no from me.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: I'm all about taking risks, and he went for it. It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, your sincerity is undeniable. It's a yes for me.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you've got guts, I'll give you that.  And who knows, maybe data flow is the new rock and roll. It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Three yeses! Andrea, congratulations, you're moving on to the next round.  Keep those data streams flowing, and maybe, just maybe, keep those romantic dreams alive too!
